bug.author: vijayphoenix
bug.summary: `encode_png` function should be exported from `tf.io` module
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/encode_png>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/encode_png</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of the issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Currently, all Image decoding and encoding functions are a part of the tf.io module but encode_png function is still a part of the tf.image module. <denchmark-h:h2>Changes required</denchmark-h>
Change tf.image.encode_png to tf.io.encode_png <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
I will be happy to help.
